trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

trans-unit.source: Implementers should take special care to honor the cancellationToken promptly, as delay in doing so may impact service availability.
trans-unit.target: Implementers should take special care to honor the cancellationToken promptly, as delay in doing so may impact service availability.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the background processing operation.
trans-unit.target: A task that represents the background processing operation.

trans-unit.source: Called on Open, this method is intended to allow derivations to implement background processing tasks which may be independent of client requests.
trans-unit.target: Called on Open, this method is intended to allow derivations to implement background processing tasks which may be independent of client requests.

trans-unit.source: Unlike worker role RoleEntryPoint or a program's Main method, instance lifetime is not tied to RunAsync; terminating RunAsync is not considered termination of the service/instance, and no additional action is taken by the framework in this case.
trans-unit.target: Unlike worker role RoleEntryPoint or a program's Main method, instance lifetime is not tied to RunAsync; terminating RunAsync is not considered termination of the service/instance, and no additional action is taken by the framework in this case.

trans-unit.source: Throwing an exception from within RunAsync is considered failure, and will result in transient fault being reported and subsequent instance movement.
trans-unit.target: Throwing an exception from within RunAsync is considered failure, and will result in transient fault being reported and subsequent instance movement.
